nodes.text: Food dispensers were automated feeding machines used to feed both sentient beings and non-sapient creatures. The adolescent Sith Lords Dromika and Quillan were known to be fed by food dispensers while residing at the Loft in the city of Hestobyll on Byllura. Food dispensers were also used to feed the thousands of children confined with the Sith Lord Odion's cloisters, a network of planet-sized mega orphanages within the Odionate.
